General.Name: Asia Metal Industries Inc
General.Description: Asia Metal Industries, Inc. engages in manufacture and sale of coating equipment in Asia, Americas, and Europe. The company's products include PP synthetic paper, solar energy, optics, high frequency and flexible copper foil substrate, passive components, battery, carbon fiber, copper foil substrate, industrial tape, transparent conductive film, and other machines. It also provides engineering services, such as pre-sales and after-sales, technical consulting, research and development testing, factory planning, and other services. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 16, Minfu Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 326
